sys_hub_flow.name: Ihub QE Anniversary Notification

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: check if today is wedding anniversary day

sys_element_mapping.value:
Congratulations on this beautiful and special occasion for you.

Happy Wedding Anniversary 2➛team events Record➛Team member➛Name

 

Regards,

IDC Platform QE Team
